Uses of Package
javax.interceptor

  • Packages that use javax.interceptor 
    Package Description
    javax.enterprise.inject.spi
    The portable extension integration SPI.
  • Classes in javax.interceptor used by javax.enterprise.inject.spi 
    Class and Description
    InvocationContext
    Exposes context information about the intercepted invocation and operations that enable interceptor methods to control the behavior of the invocation chain.
